tstats local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.src) from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic"},"name":"Traffic Sources"},"ds_48eRFoeL":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.dest) from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic"},"name":"Traffic Destinations"},"ds_74KtqLg3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true sum(All_Traffic.bytes) as volume from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic | eval volume=volume/1024/1024/1024"},"name":"Logged Traffic Volume"},"ds_ZSALdYol":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count dc(All_Traffic.dest_port) as num_destport dc(All_Traffic.dest_ip) as num_destIP from datamodel=Network_Traffic by All_Traffic.src_ip 
| rename All_Traffic.src_ip as src 
| sort - count"},"name":"Top Sources"},"ds_DNeCQoGZ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count dc(All_Traffic.dest_port) as num_destport dc(All_Traffic.src_ip) as num_srcIP from datamodel=Network_Traffic by All_Traffic.dest_ip | rename All_Traffic.dest_ip as dest
| sort - count"},"name":"Top Destinations"},"ds_Tme6Ikcc":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by All_Traffic.dest, All_Traffic.src, All_Traffic.bytes_out
| rename "All_Traffic.*" as "*" 
| stats sum(bytes_out) as bytes by src, dest 
| eval MBytes= round(bytes/1024/1024,2)
| sort - bytes 
| fields - bytes 
| head 5"},"name":"Top Communication by Volume"},"ds_yH505Qds_ds_48eRFoeL":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.dest) from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic"},"name":"Copy of Traffic Destinations"},"ds_clAUotia_ds_74KtqLg3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true sum(All_Traffic.bytes) as volume from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic earliest=-24h| eval volume=volume/1024/1024/1024"},"name":"Copy of Logged Traffic Volume"},"ds_QotzqUgF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count dc(All_Traffic.dest_ip) as num_dest_ip dc(All_Traffic.src_ip) as num_src_ip from datamodel=Network_Traffic by All_Traffic.dest_port 
| rename All_Traffic.dest_port as dest_port 
| sort - count"},"name":"Top Destination Ports"},"ds_Et8hmISF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by _time,All_Traffic.transport span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.transport"},"name":"Traffic by Protocol"},"ds_eB3IIIuq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by _time,All_Traffic.app span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.app"},"name":"Traffic by App/Protocol"},"ds_9peKqFVi_ds_hZpyeIE7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.src) from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic"},"name":"Copy of Traffic
